modName: Sugar and Spice Presets for Race Menu
summary: Various presets for RaceMenu that look like cinnamon rolls, but could actually kill you.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/l80fabP.png[/img]

Presets for RaceMenu that look like cinnamon rolls, but could actually kill you.

Dahlia - Redguard
Nastaja - Nord
Penelope - Imperial
Olive - Breton

Ithil - Altmer
Zianya - Bosmer
Chumana - Orsimer
Amari - Dunmer
[img]http://i.imgur.com/olawT0l.png[/img]
Naturally, you will need the most recent version of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url] to use these.
You will also need to install the EEO Morphs for the Elven presets to look proper.

-

If you want these presets to look [i]exactly[/i] like they do in the images provided, you [i]will[/i] need to install the following mods.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP Body[/url] by dimon99
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url] by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url] by kalilies
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url] by LogRaam
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url] by Hello Santa
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273/?]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url] by nuska
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48346/?]Nuska Warpaint[/url] by nuska
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pnSRq6J.png[/img]
Simply download the preset pack you want, then copy and paste the files into your RaceMenu preset folder.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/brWs53D.png[/img]
Please do not redistribute these presets.

Mods used in the screenshots provided are credited to their original creators, listed above.

ENB: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50501/?]Grim and Somber - Hircine[/url] by WolfGrimDark[/center]
author: yngolandtheseaghosts
